actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: Providing for an adjournment of the House from June 27, 1991 to July 9, 1991 and an adjournment of the Senate from June 28, 1991, June 29, 1991, June 30, 1991, July 1, 1991 or Tuesday, July 2, 1991 to July 8, 1991.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from June 27, 1991, until July 9, 1991, and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from June 28, 29, 30, July 1 or 2, 1991, until July 8, 1991.

titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the House from June 27, 1991 to July 9, 1991 and an adjournment of the Senate from June 28, 1991, June 29, 1991, June 30, 1991, July 1, 1991 or Tuesday, July 2, 1991 to July 8, 1991.
